content:
# The error indicates that I cannot insert iron ore into the stone furnace because I no longer have any iron ore in my inventory. 
# This happened because I previously inserted all the iron ore into the furnace for smelting.

# Since I need more iron plates, I will need to gather additional iron ore first. 
# Let's return to the nearest iron ore patch and harvest more iron ore.

iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Find the nearest iron ore resource again.
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Move to the iron ore patch.

# Harvest some iron ore.
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest a small quantity of iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting more iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
